channel.title: Blog on Dev Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Dev Notes

item.title: CSS Grid Layout Fundamentals
item.description:
CSS Grid is a powerful layout system that allows you to create complex layouts with ease. Here’s a quick example:

.container {
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
 grid-gap: 20px;
 max-width: 1200px;
 margin: 0 auto;
}

This creates a three-column grid with equal width columns and 20px gaps between them.

item.title: Git Workflow: Feature Branches and Clean History
item.description: A clean Git history is essential for maintainable projects. Here’s my approach to feature branches and keeping commits organized.

item.title: JavaScript Async/Await vs Promises
item.description: While both async/await and Promises handle asynchronous operations in JavaScript, they offer different approaches to writing and reading async code.

item.title: Python List Comprehensions: Beyond the Basics
item.description: List comprehensions are one of Python’s most elegant features, but there’s more to them than the basic syntax most developers know.
